author: Shivani Vora
title: Hotel Resort News: A Canyon Ranch in Turkey; a Faena in Miami Beach
text:
Fall is a popular time both for new hotels to open and also to announce forthcoming properties. Here are some of the buzziest openings around the world happening for the season and news of those to come.
KAPLANKAYA, TURKEY
The American spa brand Canyon Ranch is going international with the July 2016 debut of Canyon Ranch Wellness Resort at Kaplankaya on the Turkish Rivera near the city of Bodrum. The sprawling property will have 141 rooms, all with views of the Aegean Sea, a 107,500-square-foot spa featuring 40 treatment rooms, and two restaurants, one in the hotel and another more casual option near the beach that will serve Mediterranean dishes emphasizing local seafood and produce.
